snippet.title: Welcome to Badiya
snippet.description:
Badiya is an infinite procedural survival and exploration game set in the Arabian desert (Think Lawrence of Arabia). Explore, Hunt, Craft, Loot, Build, Cook, Ride, Trade, Fight and most importantly Survive to live another day!

Available now on Steam Early Access, for more information and to buy the game check out our Steam Store Page:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/545050/

Follow us on Twitter:
@SemaphoreLab

http://www.semaphorelab.com
